      • checkSubsystem

        public boolean checkSubsystem(bugtrap03.bugdomain.AbstractSystem as,
                              HealthIndicator hi,
                              int number)
        Checks if the indicators of the subsystems of the given AbstractSystem are greater than the given HealthIndicator and if the BugImpact is smaller than the given number.
        Parameters:
        as - The AbstractSystem to check.
        hi - The minimum HealthIndicator of the subsystems
        number - The maximum total BugImpact
        Returns:
        True if the conditions are satisfied
